text: The 1921-22 Austrian football championship was organized by the Lower Austrian Football Association and contested by its members. Wiener Sport-Club became Austrian football champions for the first time. The entire 9th round on 6 November 1921 was canceled due to bad weather. The matches were played on different dates. The home advantage in the second half of the season was given to the clubs who competed away in the fall regardless of the draw. Because of the harsh winter the season had to be be extended until 15 July 1922 (25 June 1922 was planned). Austria Soccer ==Table== Table mode (if points are tied):Number of wins - goal quotient Pl.
